entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Clarenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 3:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to ice pellets or freezing rain and then changing to rain near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending early in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming south 20 in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022
